Label: has fee
Definition: Indicates the fee charged by an entity to provide a service

Label: is free of charge
Definition: Indicates if the service provided by an entity is free of charge

Label: has single information point
Definition: Indicates the responsible single information point entity

Label: has legal status
Definition: Indicates the legal status of an entity

Label: has form
Definition: Indicates the form of an entity

Label: has ownership structure
Definition: Indicates the ownership structure of an entity

Label: has subsidiary
Definition: Indicates a subsidiary of an entity

Label: has registration number
Definition: Indicates the registration number of an entity

Label: has statute
Definition: Indicates the statute of the entity

Label: has source of income
Definition: Indicates sources of income of the entity

Label: has source of revenue
Definition: Indicates sources of revenue of the entity

Label: has data intermediation service provider type
Definition: Indicates the type of data intermediation service provider

Label: has activity starting date
Definition: Indicates the date when an entity starts its activity

Label: has processing date
Definition: Indicates the date when an entity starts to process data

Label: connected with
Definition: Indicates a connection between entities who use a data intermediation service

Label: conversion format
Definition: The formats to which the data is allowed to be converted

Label: has third country jurisdiction
Definition: Indicates applicability of third country jurisdiction
